txt.en: 'High atop the Wailing Hills, a mighty statue was erected in memory of the Battle of the Field of Celebrant. This is the Cuthstan, and it depicts the meeting between Cirion, the Steward of Gondor, and Eorl the Young. Long has lasted the friendship between our peoples.\n\n'Magla watches the approaches through the canyons between the hills. He followed his brothers into service, but it is clear to anyone he would rather have remained at his home, and stayed a simple farmer. Still, he is braver than you would think to look at him, or to hear him speak.'
Tell me about the Wailing Hills.
